item.description:
Hey Folks! It's Superbowl time again!

I have to work that day so I can't start the party too early...please arrive anytime ofter 6pm...game starts at 6:30

Let's make this event POT LUCK. Bring a dish/snack/beverage to share....PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE leave a comment here what you plan to bring so everyone doesn't bring the same thing. And also don't go nuts unless you love cooking like I do...we ALWAYS have too much. If you need an idea of something quick and easy just ask me!

I will make my much coveted Turkey Chili...supplies are limited!

I will also make football themed cupcakes and that cool wrapped sausage from Halloween.

Likely I will make some other stuff just not sure yet.

 

If you want to drink alcohol this will be a BYOB event and I ask that whatever you don't finish you please take home with you as I am staying sober lately. (Seriously I really quit drinking if you can believe it! ) 

 

Other things to bring:

A Game

A Friend

A Dollar (to help support the website fees)

A Smile!

 

Dog Alert...I have a very friendly Besenji and she will be out for the event. She is hypoallergenic and cannot bark. But be warned, she sits on the couches like a person and loves people to pet her!

 

Parking is on the cross street, Englewood Ave or somewhere on my lawn if there is space. DO NOT park on my street Packard....cars drive by WAY too fast there and will take off your mirror! It's happened before!

 

That's about all I can think of, contact me for anything else!
item.how_to_find_us: Mustard yellow house directly across from Englewood Ave

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Superbowl Games Night @ Nina's
